channel.title: Sai Subhakar T | saimj7
channel.description: Recent content on Sai Subhakar T | saimj7

item.title: Autonomous Driving: Traffic Sign Classification
item.description: Our research areas include enhancement in low light/noisy conditions by adding Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) connections, and contribution to a universal-regional dataset with Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs). The results obtained on the test data are comparable to the state-of-the-art models and we reached accuracies above 98% after performance evaluation in different frameworks.
